TEXT.Italian: Il festival della musica e dell'arte di Woodstock fu tenuto dal 15 al 18 agosto del 1969, in una fattoria dello stato di New York a poche miglia dalla cittadina di Woodstock. Durante i 4 giorni del festival, più di 32 artisti si esibirono di fronte a 500000 spettatori. Fu uno dei più grandi festival rock di tutti i tempi e uno dei più grandi eventi della contestazione giovanile degli anni '60. Alcune delle star più famose del rock si esibirono a Woodstock, inclusi Arlo Guthrie, Joan Baez, the Grateful Dead, Creedence Clearwater Revival, Janis Joplin, The Who, The Band, Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young e infine Jimi Hendrix.

TEXT.English: The Summer of Love has begun in the city of %s2 as the Woodstock Music Festival is held there.
TEXT.French: L'été de l'Amour a commencé dans la ville de %s2, représenté par le Festival de Musique de Wookstock
TEXT.Italian: La Summer of Love è iniziata a %s2 dove si tiene il festival di Woodstock.

TEXT.English: The Age of Aquarius has begun with the Summer of Love! Artists, students, and radicals of all kinds are turning on, tuning in, and dropping out.
TEXT.French: L'Age du Verseau a commencé avec l'été de l'Amour! Artistes, étudiants, et les radicaux de toutes sortes sont sous tension, réglage en, et le décrochage scolaire
TEXT.Italian: L'era dell'Aquarius è iniziata con la Summer of Love! Artisti, studenti e radicali di ogni tipo si stanno recando lì per divertirsi.

TEXT.English: Like, far out, man, but what will the squares think?
TEXT.French: Waouh, épatant, but que vont penser les ringards coincés?
TEXT.Italian: Wow, grande, ma cosa ne penserà la gente?

TEXT.English: The Summer of Love has begun in the %s1_civ_adjective Empire.
TEXT.French: L'été de l'Amour a commencé dans l'Empire %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.Italian: La Summer of Love è iniziata nell'impero %s1_civ_adjective.

TEXT.English: Yasnaya Polyana
TEXT.French: Yasnaya Polyana

TEXT.English: Yasnaya Polyana grants the city it is in 1 free Artist specialist for every 3 Farms in the city's radius.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Yasnaya Polyana[COLOR_REVERT] donne à votre ville un spécialiste Artiste gratuit, pour chaque 3 fermes présentes aux alentours.
TEXT.Italian: Yasnaya Polyana fornisce alla città in cui è costruita uno specialista Artista ogni 3 fattorie nel raggio cittadino.

TEXT.English: Yasnaya Polyana, or "Bright Glade" in English, was the home and estate of Leo Tolstoy. This home, 200 kilometers from Moscow, was where Tolstoy was born, lived, and wrote his greatest works. One wing of the estate was used as a school for the children of the peasants living on the estate. After his death, the home and grounds became a museum dedicated to Tolstoy's life and works.
TEXT.French: Yasnaya Polyana, or "Bright Glade" in English, was the home and estate of Leo Tolstoy. This home, 200 kilometers from Moscow, was where Tolstoy was born, lived, and wrote his greatest works. One wing of the estate was used as a school for the children of the peasants living on the estate. After his death, the home and grounds became a museum dedicated to Tolstoy's life and works.
TEXT.Italian: Yasnaya Polyana era la residenza di Leo Tolstoy. Questa casa, a 200 km da Mosca, era la casa natale di Toltstoy, dove l'artista era cresciuto ed aveva scritto i suoi più grandi capolavori. Un'ala della residenza era utilizzata come scuola per i figli dei servitori che lavoravano nella tenuta. Dopo la morte dell'arrista la tenuta divenne un museo dedicato alla vita e ai lavori di Tolstoy.

TEXT.English: Zurich-Orbital
TEXT.French: Zurich-Orbital
TEXT.Italian: Orbitale di Zurigo

TEXT.English: Zurich-Orbital is a corporate space station. A natural extension of the Swiss banking industry, Zurich-Orbital offers 100% guaranteed safe, secure storage of even the most valuable assets and information.
TEXT.French: Zurich-Orbital is a corporate space station. A natural extension of the Swiss banking industry, Zurich-Orbital offers 100% guaranteed safe, secure storage of even the most valuable assets and information.
TEXT.Italian: L'Orbitale di Zurigo è una stazione spaziale di proprietà di una corporazione. Una estensione naturale dell'industria bancaria svizzera, l'Orbitale di Zurigo fornisce un deposito garantito e sicuro al 100% per gli oggetti e le informazioni più importanti.

TEXT.English: Build Zurich-Orbital to increase your gold and espionage production, as well as allowing you to build Zurich-Orbital Uplink.
TEXT.French: Build Zurich-Orbital to increase your gold and espionage production, as well as allowing you to build Zurich-Orbital Uplink.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci l'Orbitale di Zurigo per incrementare la tua produzione di oro e spionaggio, oltre a poter costruire l'Uplink dell'Orbitale di Zurigo.

TEXT.English: Zurich-Orbital Uplink
TEXT.French: Liaison vers Zurich-Orbital
TEXT.Italian: Uplink dell'Orbitale di Zurigo

TEXT.English: Zurich-Orbital Uplinks offer secure communications with the facility of Zurich-Orbital. These uplinks are the only assured way to transmit information safely to the station.
TEXT.French: Zurich-Orbital Uplinks offer secure communications with the facility of Zurich-Orbital. These uplinks are the only assured way to transmit information safely to the station.
TEXT.Italian: Gli Uplink dell'orbitale di Zurigo offrono comunicazioni sicure con l'Orbitale di Zurigo. Questi uplink sono l'unico mezzo sicuro per trasmettere informazioni alla stazione orbitale.

TEXT.English: Zurich-Orbital Uplink increases your gold and espionage production, and protects your cities against enemy spies.
TEXT.French: Zurich-Orbital Uplink increases your gold and espionage production, and protects your cities against enemy spies.
TEXT.Italian: Gli uplink dell'Orbitale di Zurigo proteggono la tua produzione di oro e spionaggio, proteggendo le tue città dalle spie nemiche.

TEXT.English: Organic Computer Lab
TEXT.French: Laboratoire d'Ordinateurs Organiques

TEXT.English: Build an Organic Computer Lab to increase your cities Science.
TEXT.French: Construire un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratoire d'Ordinateurs Organiques[COLOR_REVERT] améliorera la science de votre ville.

TEXT.English: Organic computing is a form of biologically-inspired computing with organic properties. It has emerged recently as a challenging vision for future information processing systems. Organic Computing is based on the insight that we will soon be surrounded by large collections of autonomous systems, which are equipped with sensors and actuators, aware of their environment, communicate freely, and organise themselves in order to perform the actions and services that seem to be required.
TEXT.French: L'informatique organique est une forme d'informatique d'inspiration biologique aux propriétés organiques. Il est apparu récemment comme une vision difficile pour les futurs systèmes de traitement de l'information. Le calcul organique est basé sur l'idée que nous serons bientôt entourés de grandes collections de systèmes autonomes, qui sont équipés de capteurs et d'actionneurs, conscients de leur environnement, communiquent librement et s'organisent afin d'exécuter les actions et les services qui semblent être requis.
TEXT.Polish: Biokomputer to komputer, w którym obliczenia zachodzą dzięki reakcjom chemicznym między cząsteczkami DNA.
